name: Liquid Dreams
description:
Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1. 
Jarad has been experiencing many nightmares for the past month, it's almost as if he's cursed. He can't stand it anymore so he decides to talk about it to his psychologist, who just seems to have the right solution for him...

What will Jarad do? Will the monsters in his dreams ever stop tormenting him? 

Art by "Xicx". Twitter: https://twitter.com/CashDevil_unltd; Itch: https://xicx.itch.io/
